text: Retzia is a genus of flowering plants in the family Stilbaceae described as a genus in 1776.Thunberg, Carl Peter 1776. Physiographiska Sälskapets Handlingar 1: 55Tropicos, Euthystachys A. DC. There is only one known species, Retzia capensis, native to the Cape Province region in South Africa.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ==References== ==External links== * Category:Monotypic Lamiales genera Category:Stilbaceae Category:Endemic flora of South Africa
title: Retzia
